titles.title: Veterans Education and Technical Skills Opportunity Act of 2025
VETS Opportunity Act of 2025

VETS Opportunity Act of 2025
Veterans Education and Technical Skills Opportunity Act of 2025
VETS Opportunity Act of 2025

To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the criteria for approval of certain independent study programs for purposes of the educational assistance programs of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the criteria for approval of certain independent study programs for purposes of the educational assistance programs of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
VETS Opportunity Act of 2025

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 119-308.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 262.

action.text: Mr. Bost moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1458.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

committee.name: House Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
